import React, { Component, useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; const contactfrom = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( 'YOUR_SERVICE_ID', 'YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID', form.current, 'YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY' ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return (
